_examples.MICRODATA:
Ghostbusters
  
  
    
      Bill Murray
    
    Dr. Peter Venkman
_examples.PRE-MARKUP:
A JSON example of a PerformanceRole, in which
the Role represents the acting contribution made by
Bill Murray in the film Ghostbusters. The Role entity
allows us to additional information, such as the
character's name that he played in the film.
_examples.RDFA:
Ghostbusters
  
  
    
      Bill Murray
    
    Dr. Peter Venkman

_properties.descriptionZh: 演出和剧目中演员所扮演的角色的名字
_properties.rdfs:comment: The name of a character played in some acting or performing role, i.e. in a PerformanceRole.
_properties.rdfs:label: characterName

_pTree.descriptionZh: 戏剧演出（如电影、电视剧）中的角色
_pTree.rdfs:comment: A PerformanceRole is a Role that some entity places with regard to a theatrical performance, e.g. in a Movie, TVSeries etc.
_pTree.rdfs:label: PerformanceRole

_examples.PRE-MARKUP:
A basic Role example in JSON that
shows how to qualify the 'member' property
by adding an intermediate Role entity.

A JSON example of an OrganizationRole being used to qualify
the 'alumniOf' property (which is inverseOf 'alumni').
Note that we use startDate to indicate when the alumniOf
situation began, which was the date of leaving the organization.

_examples.PRE-MARKUP:
A JSON example of an OrganizationRole, showing information
about a 'member' of a 'SportsTeam', including time qualfiers
(when he began and ended that role).

_properties.rdfs:comment: The end date and time of the item (in ISO 8601 date format).
_properties.rdfs:label: endDate

_properties.descriptionZh: 由个人或组织发挥，扮演或担任的角色。例如例如，漫画书的创作者团队可能会创作“蜘蛛侠”，“钢铁侠”的角色; 或运动队的运动员可能会在运动场上担任“四分卫”的角色
_properties.rdfs:comment: A role played, performed or filled by a person or organization. For example, the team of creators for a comic book might fill the roles named 'inker', 'penciller', and 'letterer'; or an athlete in a SportsTeam might play in the position named 'Quarterback'.
_properties.rdfs:label: roleName

_properties.descriptionZh: 某事的开始日期和时间（按照ＩＳＯ ８６０１日期标准）
_properties.rdfs:comment: The start date and time of the item (in ISO 8601 date format).
_properties.rdfs:label: startDate

_pTree.descriptionZh: 对关系或属性的其他信息的表示。 例如，角色可以用来表示在特定时间段内连接一些竞技队到玩家的“成员”角色。 或者一个人在电影中的“演员”角色是针对某个特定的角色名称。 这样的属性可以附加到一个角色实体，然后使用普通属性（如“member”或“actor”）与主实体相关联。
_pTree.rdfs:comment:
Represents additional information about a relationship or property. For example a Role can be used to say that a 'member' role linking some SportsTeam to a player occurred during a particular time period. Or that a Person's 'actor' role in a Movie was for some particular characterName. Such properties can be attached to a Role entity, which is then associated with the main entities using ordinary properties like 'member' or 'actor'.

See also blog post.
_pTree.rdfs:label: Role

_properties.descriptionZh: 该项的一个附加类型， 通常用于从外部词典中向微数据语法添加更加具体的类型。它表示事物和事物本身所属的类之间的关系。在RDFa语法中, 对多类型最好使用‘typeof’属性这样的本地RDFa语法. Schema.org 工具对额外类型的理解较弱，特别是外部定义的额外类型。
_properties.rdfs:comment: An additional type for the item, typically used for adding more specific types from external vocabularies in microdata syntax. This is a relationship between something and a class that the thing is in. In RDFa syntax, it is better to use the native RDFa syntax - the 'typeof' attribute - for multiple types. Schema.org tools may have only weaker understanding of extra types, in particular those defined externally.
_properties.rdfs:label: additionalType

  41st President of the United States
  is the father of
  
    George W. Bush, the
    43rd President of the United States.

_examples.RDFA:
George Bush, the
  41st President of the United States
  is the father of
  
    George W. Bush, the
    43rd President of the United States.

_properties.descriptionZh: 描述的子属性。 用于消除与其他类似项之间歧义的简短描述。 其它属性（特别是名称）的信息对于消歧义可能是必要的。
_properties.rdfs:comment: A sub property of description. A short description of the item used to disambiguate from other, similar items. Information from other properties (in particular, name) may be necessary for the description to be useful for disambiguation.
_properties.rdfs:label: disambiguatingDescription

_properties.rdfs:comment: The identifier property represents any kind of identifier for any kind of Thing, such as ISBNs, GTIN codes, UUIDs etc. Schema.org provides dedicated properties for representing many of these, either as textual strings or as URL (URI) links. See background notes for more details.
_properties.rdfs:label: identifier

_examples.MICRODATA:
Mom's World Famous Banana Bread
  By John Smith,
  May 8, 2009
  
  This classic banana bread recipe comes
  from my mom -- the walnuts add a nice texture and flavor to the banana
  bread.
  Prep Time: 15 minutes
  Cook time: 1 hour
  Yield: 1 loaf
  Tags: Low fat
  
    Nutrition facts:
    240 calories,
    9 grams fat
  
  Ingredients:
  - 3 or 4 ripe bananas, smashed
  - 1 egg
  - 3/4 cup of sugar
  ...
  Instructions:
  
  Preheat the oven to 350 degrees. Mix in the ingredients in a bowl. Add
  the flour last. Pour the mixture into a loaf pan and bake for one hour.
  
  140 comments:
  
    
    
  
  From Janel, May 5 -- thank you, great recipe!
  ...

enjoying your morning coffee.

_properties.rdfs:label: image

_properties.descriptionZh: 表示这个东西是描述的主要实体的页面
_properties.rdfs:comment: Indicates a page (or other CreativeWork) for which this thing is the main entity being described. See background notes for details.
_properties.rdfs:label: mainEntityOfPage

_properties.descriptionZh: 潜在的与之搭配的动作，它描述了一个理想化的动作，在这个动作中，这个东西会起到“对象”的作用。
_properties.rdfs:comment: Indicates a potential Action, which describes an idealized action in which this thing would play an 'object' role.
_properties.rdfs:label: potentialAction

_properties.rdfs:comment: URL of a reference Web page that unambiguously indicates the item's identity. E.g. the URL of the item's Wikipedia page, Wikidata entry, or official website.
_properties.rdfs:label: sameAs
